column4: <ref name=I11>{{FR|I11}}</ref> were names for a gate at the northern end of the hedge known as the [[High Hay]].

column2: a traveller would come to the northern end of the High Hay
column3: where it ran beside to the road to meet the River [[Brandywine]]. In the Hedge at this point was a guarded gate that led to [[Buckland]]
